verses.name: Genesis 21:13
verses.text: And also of the son of the bondwoman will I make a nation, because he is thy seed.

verses.name: Genesis 21:14
verses.text: And Abraham rose up early in the morning, and took bread, and a bottle of water, and gave it unto Hagar, putting it on her shoulder, and the child, and sent her away: and she departed, and wandered in the wilderness of Beer–sheba.

verses.name: Genesis 21:15
verses.text: And the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
